name: Sacrifision
description:
(Game works best in the executable)

You're a cultist descending down a dungeon full of monsters and weapons. Make sacrifices to your god for power-ups and try to survive as long as you can...

Controls:

Movement: WASD or arrow keys

Interact: z

Cancel: x

Attack: left mouse button

All art, music and scripts are made by me, and sound fx with the help of BFXR

BFXR (SFX): https://www.bfxr.net

FL Studio (music): https://www.image-line.com/

Unity3D (game engine): https://unity3d.com/get-unity/download

LibreSprite (art): https://libresprite.github.io/#!/
